column7: Supervised field experience in a full-time or part-time internship position related to the field of Sustainable Design. Designed to introduce students to professional employment and actual practice. Full documentation and approval of internship activities required. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of three times. Prerequisite: For Sustainable Design majors only. Registration only with instructor permission (sustaindesign@illinois.edu).
